name: Black Cato
description:
Asalam o Alaikum Everyone.

Black Cato v1.1 is Here with 2 More Levels

Available for PC

i am Arslan Akram From GameChef. We are Happy that Black Cato is Available for Everyone to Play.

Black Cato is Made for Mini Jam 77: Courage

Story:

A cat lost his family and now he is in a Dark and Quiet Place where he has to Survive by Eating Chicken Legs Yummy... i Mean Surviving and Striving to Meat... i mean Meet his Family.    Family will be added in the Next Update.

Keyboard Controls

1. W A S D  &  Arrow Keys     For Movement

2. Space bar            For Jump
